snippet: Arvind Mahankali of Bayside, Queens, went far at the Scripps National Spelling Bee, so City Room presented him with its own special - some people might call them preposterous - words to spell.
abstract: Arvind Mahankali of Bayside, Queens, went far at the Scripps National Spelling Bee, so City Room presented him with its own special - some people might call them preposterous - words to spell.

headline.main: Sure, He Can Spell 'Opodeldoc,' but How's His Noo Yawk-Speak?
